|adm_ctr_type=''[[village#Russia|selo]]'' |adm_ctr_name=[[Bogorodskoye, Khabarovsk Krai|Bogorodskoye]] |adm_ctr_ref=<ref name="OKATO" /> |no_of_rural_localities=32 |counts_ref=<ref |mun_formation1_no_of_rural_settlements=18 |mun_formation1_counts_ref=<ref name="KhabarovskK_mun2">Law #208</ref> |mun_formation1_leader_title |mun_formation1_leader_title_ref |pop_2010census=18729 |urban_pop_2010census=0% |rural_pop_2010census=100% |pop_2010_census_ref=<ref name="2010Census" /> |pop_latest |pop_latest_date |pop_latest_ref |established_date |established_date_ref |newspaper |newspaper_ref |website=http://www.adminulchi.ru/ |website_ref |commonscat= |date=March 2013 }} [[File:Ravenstein-Tyr-monument-196.png|thumb|The [[Tyr, Russia|Tyr]] Cliff as seen by [[Ernst Georg Ravenstein]] ca. 1860]] '''Ulchsky District''' ({{lang-ru|У́льчский райо́н}}) is an administrative<ref name="KhabarovskK_admlist">Resolution #143-pr</ref> and municipal<ref name="KhabarovskK_md">Law #194</ref> district ([[raion]]), one of the [[administrative divisions of Khabarovsk Krai|seventeen]] in [[Khabarovsk Krai]], [[Russia]]. It is located in the east of the [[krai]].<!-- and borders with [[ District]] in the north, [[ District]] in the east, [[ District]] in the south, and with [[ District]] in the west.--> The area of the district is {{convert|39310|km2|sp=us}}.{{citation needed|date=March 2013}} Its [[administrative center]] is the [[types of inhabited localities in Russia|rural locality]] (a ''[[village#Russia|selo]]'') of [[Bogorodskoye, Khabarovsk Krai|Bogorodskoye]].<ref name="OKATO">{{OKATO reference|08 250}}</ref> Population: {{ru-census|p2010=18,729|p2002=23,930|p1989=28,746}} The population of Bogorodskoye accounts for 20.8% of the district's total population.<ref name="2010Census" /> ==History== A number of interesting [[Yuan Dynasty|Yuan]] and [[Ming Dynasty]] archaeological monuments have been found on the Tyr Cliff near the village of [[Tyr, Russia|Tyr]] in this district. ==Demographics== Over 90% of the Russian population of [[Ulch people]] live in Ulchsky District. ==References== ===Notes=== {{Reflist}} ===Sources=== *{{RussiaAdmMunRef|kha|adm|list}} *{{RussiaAdmMunRef|kha|mun|mdlist}} *{{RussiaAdmMunRef|kha|mun|list1}} {{Khabarovsk Krai}} {{Use mdy dates|date=March 2013}} [[Category:Districts of Khabarovsk Krai]]
